thread.title: House Speaker Ryan Says Trump Won’t Fire Special Counsel in Russia Probe

author: Byron Tau
title: House Speaker Ryan Says Trump Won’t Fire Special Counsel in Russia Probe
text:
WASHINGTON—House Speaker Paul Ryan on Tuesday said that he had received assurances that President Donald Trump isn’t considering firing the special counsel appointed to investigate Russian interference in the 2016 election, amid concerns over Mr. Trump’s attacks on the counsel. 
But the Wisconsin Republican declined to say who provided the assurances and wouldn’t outline any steps that Congress would take if Mr. Trump took any action to end the investigation. 
... RELATED VIDEO What People Really Mean When They Say 'Collusion' When it comes to the Russia investigation, the word "Collusion" gets thrown around a lot. But there's not a lot of clarity on what it actually means. Is it illegal? Is it grounds for impeachment? We asked a law professor to explain. Photo Illustration: Drew Evans/The Wall Street Journal.
